product_name: adidas Hiking DriRelease Logo T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Enjoy the comfort of cotton without sacrificing performance. The adidas Hiking dri-release(R) Logo T-Shirt wicks away sweat to keep you cool during long days on the trail. dri-release(R) technology provides moisture-wicking and quick-drying properties that won't wash out. Built-in UPF 30 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. adidas Hiking dri-release Logo T-Shirt features a relaxed fit. Overstock.
short_description: Enjoy the comfort of cotton without sacrificing performance. The adidas Hiking dri-release(R) Logo T-Shirt wicks away sweat to keep you cool during long days on the trail.
